title: What are some alternatives to HP printers? - Quora

response.answer_text: I haven’t looked into printers at all, to be honest. If you went to Best Buy, there are a few technically knowledgeable sales people, but usually they have a tendency to push you in a direction if you aren’t on top of what you need, so I suggest using the net to look up “ten best printers” or “what printers compare to Hewlett-Packard?” I’m pretty sure you’ll get some good feedback. I might be looking for a new car soon, so first I need to know what model do I want - I have a 2.5 year old Black Lab who goes everywhere with me, so an SUV is what I need. Then, I research the most reliable SUV, one that holds its value, one that appeals to my aesthetics, and so on. Do some research so you can make a smart decision. Best of luck, Mahir!
“What are some alternatives to HP printers?” Every printer that’s not made by HP, obviously. There are many brands of printer out there.. personally, I prefer the ones made by Epson.
